com.yworks.yfiles.graphml

Class ValueSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yworks.yfiles.graphml.ValueSerializer

  • public class ValueSerializer
extends Object
    Helper classes used during the XAML serialization of instances.

    Using this class instances can be written in xml attributes as strings.

      • canConvertFromString

        public boolean canConvertFromString(String value,
                                    IValueSerializerContext context)
        Determines whether this instance can convert the specified value from the given string.
        Parameters:
        value - The string value to convert.
        context - The context.
        Returns:
        true if this instance can convert the specified value from the string; otherwise, false.
